sentences.en: Continuous availability demands that the database engine be available for processing with no perceivable downtime.
sentences.cn: 持续可用性要求数据库引擎随时可用，没有可觉察的停机时间。

sentences.en: Instead of that, the destination is a situation that is perceivable, and declared desirable.
sentences.cn: 与之相反，目的地是一种可感知、值得期待 的位置。

sentences.en: Some things are not perceivable by sense, but only cogitable by reason.
sentences.cn: 有些事物不能以感官觉察, 只能由推理而得知.

sentences.en: The principle of the method is simple, more perceivable and of high accuracy.
sentences.cn: 此种方法原理简单, 直观性强,精确度较高.

sentences.en: There will not be any perceivable effect on the animal during communication awake or asleep.
sentences.cn: 于沟通时动物并不会有任何可感知的效果,无论是清醒还是睡著.

words.tran_cn: 可察觉的；可感知的；看得见的
显然地；可感觉得出地；看得出地
知觉；[生理] 感觉；看法；洞察力；获取
感知；认为（perceive的过去分词）；领会
